page.title: 06HOUSING - IDEN GREEN
page.content: Total dwellings 171. Detached 106, Semi-detached 56,Terrace 9. Iden Green Village has 97 including Council Houses 20,Alms houses 3, Public Houses 2,Farmhouse 1,Village Shop 1. There is 1 holiday cottage for letting and no second home within the Village. Every house has a garden. 4 Swimming pools,4 tennis courts in Standen Street. Oast houses and farmhouses have been converted into homes but there are still 6 working farms and 3 oasts. {BUILDING STYLES: Weatherboarding}41, {Brick and tile hung}41. {AGE OF HOUSES.}A survey showed 14 houses over 200 years old most were between 20-100 years old. 6 houses under 10 years are infilling. Kent Structure Plan. 2 Hall Houses of 500+ Campion House,Standen Street, and Dingleden House.
